data.name: House of Memories Demo
data.detailed_description:
There is something foul happening in the Rocksfield City. There are monsters everywhere and you can't hide forever.

  • Dive into the dark world of House of Memories to unravel horrific mysteries.
  • Solve puzzles to uncover the secrets of the family Dudley and the whereabouts of your friend, Happy.
  • Use your best skills and creative to outwit your enemies.
data.about_the_game:
There is something foul happening in the Rocksfield City. There are monsters everywhere and you can't hide forever.

  • Dive into the dark world of House of Memories to unravel horrific mysteries.
  • Solve puzzles to uncover the secrets of the family Dudley and the whereabouts of your friend, Happy.
  • Use your best skills and creative to outwit your enemies.
data.short_description: House of Memories is a third person horror game where you play as Greg, a 7-year-old boy whose soul got trapped into a ragdoll's body during a search for a friend. Now, you must find your real body and your friend, but be aware, the path will be full of monsters trying to capture you.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil, German, Turkish, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
